languages.text: {n}Идира открывает уста, и вы видите, что между зубов на месте языка зияет чернота. Вместо ее голоса слышна сотня потусторонних голосов варпа:{/n} "Господин желает жертв... Живых жертв... Брось их в варп... Их пути будут расщеплены и вплетены в твой путь".

{n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира открывает уста, и вы видите, что между зубов на месте языка зияет чернота. Вместо ее голоса слышна сотня потусторонних голосов варпа:{/n} "Господин желает жертв... Живых жертв... Брось их в варп... Их пути будут расщеплены и вплетены в твой путь".

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'Idira ouvre la bouche, vous ne voyez qu'un trou béant entre ses dents, là où devrait se trouver sa langue. De sa gorge jaillit le son d'une centaine de voix surnaturelles et déformées :{/n} « Le maître exige un sacrifice... Un sacrifice vivant... Jetez-les dans le Warp... Leurs voies se déferont pour s'intégrer aux vôtres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'Idira ouvre la bouche, vous ne voyez que du noir entre ses dents, là où devrait se trouver sa langue. De sa gorge jaillit le son d'une centaine de voix surnaturelles et déformées :{/n} « Le maître exige un sacrifice... Un sacrifice vivant... Jetez-les dans le Warp... Leurs voies se déferont pour s'intégrer aux vôtres. »
traits.speaker: IdiraAlternative

languages.text: {n}Idira abre la boca y, entre sus dientes, ves una oscuridad inmensa en vez de su lengua. Cuando habla, es un coro de cientos de voces disformes en vez de su voz:{/n} «El amo exige un sacrificio... En vida... Lánzal{mf|o|a}s a la disformidad... Su camino será deshecho y añadido al tuyo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira abre la boca y, entre sus dientes, ves una oscuridad inmensa en vez de su lengua. Cuando habla, es un coro de cientos de voces disformes en vez de su voz:{/n} «El amo exige un sacrificio... En vida... Lánzal{mf|o|a}s a la disformidad... Su camino será deshecho y añadido al tuyo».
traits.speaker: IdiraAlternative

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉张开了嘴，你看到她的舌头已经不见了，牙齿之间变成了一团漆黑。她的喉咙中发出了几百个来自亚空间的声音。{/n}“主人要求祭品……活祭……把他们统统扔进亚空间……他们的道路就会展开，与你的道路交织在一起。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉张开了嘴，你看到她的舌头已经不见了，牙齿之间变成了一团漆黑。她的喉咙中发出了几百个来自亚空间的声音。{/n}“主人要求祭品……活祭……把他们统统扔进亚空间……他们的道路就会展开，与你的道路交织在一起。”
traits.speaker: IdiraAlternative

languages.text: {n}イディラが口を開くと、歯と歯の間に舌ではなく黒いものが見えた。彼女の声の代わりに、数多の異世界の歪みの声が語りかける。{/n}「主は生贄を望まれる…生きた生贄を…彼らを歪みに放り出せ…その道は、お前のものに織り込まれるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが口を開くと、歯と歯の間に舌ではなく黒いものが見えた。彼女の声の代わりに、数多の異世界の歪みの声が語りかける。{/n}「主は生贄を望まれる…生きた生贄を…彼らを歪みに放り出せ…その道は、お前のものに織り込まれるだろう」
traits.speaker: IdiraAlternative

languages.text: {n}Idira öffnet den Mund, und du siehst die Schwärze zwischen ihren Zähnen, wo eigentlich ihre Zunge sein sollte. Einhundert andersweltliche Warpstimmen sprechen statt ihrer Stimme:{/n} "Der Meister fordert ein Opfer ... Ein lebendes Opfer ... Werft sie in den Warp ... Ihre Pfade werden entwirrt und dann in den Euren gewebt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."

Ihre Pfade werden entwirrt und dann in den Euren gewebt werden."
traits.speaker: IdiraAlternative

languages.text: {n}İdira ağzını açınca dişlerinin arasında dilinin olması gereken yerde bir karanlık olduğunu görüyorsun. İdira'nın sesi yerine yüzlerce dünya dışı öteboyut sesi konuşuyor.{/n} "Efendi kurban istiyor... Yaşayan bir kurban... Onları öteboyuta fırlat... Yolları sökülüp senin yoluna örülecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira opens her mouth and you see the blackness between her teeth in place of her tongue. A hundred otherworldly warp voices speak instead of her voice:{/n} "The master requests a sacrifice... A living sacrifice... Toss them into the warp... Their paths will be unravelled and woven into yours."
